Package org.prevayler

Interface Summary
Clock Tells the time.
Prevayler Implementations of this interface can provide transparent persistence and replication to all Business Objects in a Prevalent System.
Query Represents a query that can be executed on a Prevalent System.
SureTransactionWithQuery The same as TransactionWithQuery except it does not throw Exception when executed.
Transaction An atomic Transaction to be executed on a Prevalent System.
TransactionWithQuery A Transaction that also returns a result or throws an Exception after executing.
 

Class Summary
PrevaylerFactory Provides easy access to all Prevayler configurations and implementations available in this distribution.
